info.name: A Better Twitter
info.description: This style removes "almost" all Twitter bullshit. DON'T RATE THIS STYLE BAD BECAUSE IT DOESN'T WORK, TWITTER CHANGED THE WEB DESIGN MAKING ALL TWITTER STYLES BROKEN. Use THIS then log out and make login again to use the older design. You can help me fix things on Github. What it removes and do: 1 - @someone liked @anothersomeone bullshit. 2 - That crap of Moments wich I think you don't use so do I. 3 - Shitty Twitter ADS. 4 - Any polution on the sidebars like users to follow and etc. 5 - Expand Twitter media like photos, so you don't have to click on them like a idiot. 6 - Centralize content. 7 - Removes your depression, just kidding. Thanks to those who helped me to fix and maintain the style: Trigstur PendingChaos skaulana
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.6 Buch of things Version 1.5 Fixes for design and users that use Firefox 59.0.2. Version 1.4 Small fixes (Good things in small packages?) Version 1.3 Now gifs and videos are expanded too. Version 1.2 Fix for users without profile pic. Version 1.1 Content now uses more space on screen. Version 1.0 Beta.
